class.name: GridMapGIData
class.brief_description: Contains baked [GridMap] octant meshes to be used in global illumination.
class.description: Contains baked [GridMap] octant meshes, which are subdivisions of the GridMap, to be used in global illumination. It is replaced every time lightmaps are baked in [LightmapGI].

members.member: Contains baked [GridMap] octant meshes, which are subdivisions of the GridMap, to be used in global illumination. It is replaced every time lightmaps are baked in [LightmapGI].
